name: The Devil's Cabbage
description:
The Devil’s cabbage is a classic mix-up with a heavy pac-man feel. Your objective is to grow and sell marijuana plants all while avoiding detecting from those pesky community gardeners. Power your way through 7 levels in the LD41 installment of the game. We really want to continue development on this one so please let us know your thoughts, suggestions and comments.

Arrow Keys or WASD is all you need to play.
